document_data.name: Girdle of Everhealing
document_data.mainbody: A '''''girdle of everhealing''''' was an [[enchanted]] item that healed hurts.
document_data.Powers: Such girdles allowed the person strapped in to endure many harms, including [[acid]] and [[poison]], without dying. Presumably, it healed their injuries, or granted regeneration.
document_data.History: The [[Chosen of Mystra]] [[Elminster Aumar]] was regularly tortured with poison and acid while strapped into one such ''girdle'' between {{yearlink|761}} and {{yearlink|764}}.
